mewconnect.option-text: Scan the QR code to access with MEW wallet or MEWconnect

modal.title: Mobile Access
modal.text1: Please use MEW wallet or MEWconnect App to scan the QR code above
modal.text2: Don't have the MEW wallet app? Download now.

mewconnect.warning: MEW wallet and MEWconnect apps are not compatible with iPads.

finney.scan-info: To connect, scan the QR code from {wallet} app on your {finney-bc}

warning.not-connected: Please make sure your device is connected.

hardware.examples: Ledger wallet, FINNEY, Trezor, BitBox, KeepKey, XWallet

bitbox.pairing: Please confirm the encryption pairing code matches what is shown on your BitBox02.

software.option-text: Keystore file, Private key, Mnemonic phrase

modal.title: Access by Software
modal.purchase-text: Purchase a hardware wallet for the highest security when accessing your crypto.

metamask.option-text: Use the MetaMask extension to access my wallet

warning.safari: MetaMask is only available in these browsers:

warning.unlock: Can't access wallet! Please unlock your wallet through the Metamask extension

modal.title: Access via MetaMask
modal.text: Please use MyEtherWallet on a secure (SSL/HTTPS) connection to connect.
modal.terms: To Access my Wallet, I accept {terms}.

modal.title: Choose the App

accept-terms: To Access my Wallet, I accept {terms}

xwallet-desc: Use Pundi X Savings account by MEW to scan the QR code above
